main event: A civilian woman reported seeing a bright, glowing white light that appeared to be bouncing or oscillating in the sky before descending into the water and then ascending again, all within a 5-6 minute period.
interesting points: The object was described as slightly pear-shaped and the size of a baseball.
A small, brilliant light appeared to leave the bottom of the larger object and descend into the water before the larger object hovered over the spot.
The object accelerated slowly at first but then quickly disappeared from view.
No sound was heard associated with the object.
Weather conditions at the time included light winds, clear skies, and unlimited visibility.
